019
020import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
021import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.component.ComponentBuilder;
022import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.component.transaction.Transaction;
023import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.component.transaction.TransactionParameters;
024import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.component.transaction.TransactionResult;
025
026import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
027
028/**
029 * TransactionBuilder
030 *
031 * @author creatorfromhell
032 * @since 1.0.0.2
033 */
034public class TransactionBuilder implements ComponentBuilder {
035
036  protected Transaction transaction;
037
038  public TransactionBuilder() {
039
040  }
041
042  public TransactionBuilder(final Transaction transaction) {
043
044    this.transaction = transaction;
045  }
046
047  /**
048   * Returns a new TransactionBuilder instance for the specified type.
049   *
050   * @param type the type of transaction
051   *
052   * @return a new TransactionBuilder instance
053   */
054  public static TransactionBuilder of(final String type) {
055
056    return new TransactionBuilder(PluginCore.engine().transactions().get(type));
057  }
058
059  /**
060   * Sets the provided TransactionParameters for the current TransactionBuilder instance.
061   *
062   * @param parameters the TransactionParameters to set for the builder
063   *
064   * @return the current TransactionBuilder instance with the provided parameters set
065   */
066  public TransactionBuilder with(final TransactionParameters parameters) {
067
068    transaction.with(parameters);
069    return this;
070  }
071
072  /**
073   * Sets the provided transaction for the current TransactionBuilder instance.
074   *
075   * @param transaction the transaction to set for the builder
076   *
077   * @return the current TransactionBuilder instance with the provided transaction set
078   */
079  public TransactionBuilder with(final Transaction transaction) {
080
081    this.transaction = transaction;
082    return this;
083  }
084
085  /**
086   * Executes the transaction and returns the result.
087   *
088   * @return The result of executing the transaction.
089   */
090  TransactionResult execute() {
091
092    return transaction.execute();
093  }
094
095  /**
096   * Asynchronously executes the transaction and sets the result in the provided CompletableFuture.
097   *
098   * @param result The CompletableFuture to hold the result of executing the transaction.
099   */
100  void execute(final CompletableFuture<TransactionResult> result) {
101
102    transaction.execute(result);
103  }
104
105  /**
106   * Returns the identifier of the component.
107   *
108   * @return the identifier of the component as a string.
109   */
110  @Override
111  public String identifier() {
112
113    return "transaction";
114  }
115
116  /**
117   * Returns a component builder instance that can be used to build components.
118   *
119   * @return a ComponentBuilder instance.
120   */
121  @Override
122  public ComponentBuilder builder() {
123
124    return new TransactionBuilder();
125  }
126}
